I could see this being a love/hate it type movie and a future cult classic. the directing, acting, writing, cinematography is great, but it's fast paced, sorta incoherent, etc. I would say the closet movie to it would be Scott Pilgrim, but still, this is a movie you have to see and judge for yourself.

You will either love or hate this film, I absolutely loved it. Great direction, rapid fire dialogue and heaps of pop culture references (bonus points for the awesome David Cronenberg homage). Good quality, but i just downloaded the blu-ray rip and it's amazing
